summary: Investigate and mitigate blank white screen in Caffeine preview caused by injected draft editor script (disallowed origin) by stripping suspected dependency chain and adding a temporary in-site blocker to prevent preview system injection.
architectural_notes: Caffeine preview may auto-inject an editor subsystem (draft-script.js) based on bundle detection, which can fail with a 'disallowed origin' error and prevent the app from mounting.
known_issues: Preview can render a blank white screen when injected draft editor script throws 'disallowed origin' for the preview URL (e.g., https://just-olive-eim-draft.caffeine.xyz).

existing_features.title: Add a temporary, early-executing in-site blocker that prevents the Caffeine preview system’s injected draft editor script from loading/executing (e.g., draft-script.js / draft-editor), so the preview no longer crashes with the “disallowed origin” error and the React app can mount.
Strip the suspected editor-triggering dependency chain from the frontend bundle so the preview system stops deciding to inject the draft editor subsystem in the first place.

new_feature_requests.summary: Strip suspected editor-triggering dependency chain from the bundle to stop Caffeine preview from injecting draft-script.js (disallowed origin) and causing blank screen
Add a temporary in-site script/workaround to block the problematic dependency chain / prevent preview system injection of the editor script

projectName: Mitigate Caffeine preview blank screen by blocking injected draft editor script and stripping editor-triggering dependency chain
